title: Codon chart with RNA questions, 5 answer options 2

content.question: Which of the following modifications of the DNA would produce the greatest change in the primary structure of the polypeptide chain?

choices.label: Deleting the first T in the second triplet
Changing the second triplet to read 3’ CTC 5’
Changing the third triplet to read 3’ AAC 5’
Changing the fourth triplet to read 3’ CCA 5’

content.answer: Deleting the first T in the second triplet

skill.text: 6.E: Predict the causes or effects of a change in, or disruption to, one or more components in a biological system.
